name: 蘇育民
objective:
主要針對各種機能空間之室內設計規劃整體操作流程，透過實列介紹，瞭解實際施工圖如何繪製並論及施工現場施做問題解析。並介紹各種風格式樣之潮流趨勢之建材選用與整合室內色彩、照明、家具及設備等

本學期佐以建築系一至三年級之設計課程之內容進行室內設計落實之內容。
The course focuses on the overall practice procedure of interior planning and design in terms of various spaces. It covers the construction drawing method and the analysis of practical problems with some appropriate cases. Scores of style trends in materials and how they can be consistent with color, lighting, and equipment would also be introduced.
